EmailTemplate.subject: Festivals, Careers Events and Volunteering - Coming up with The Challenge Society
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey there {!Contact.Name},
First off I want to say a massive congratulations to all of you who have recently graduated with The Distinction Award. This prestigious award is only awarded to those graduates who have gone above and beyond in their communities, or made a significant impact to the National Citizen Service programme. Coming up this year we already have a huge range of opportunities for you to be involved with - from music festivals to careers days.
We also have just launched our shiny new website - keep in touch with everything that is going on at www.tcssouthlondon.co.uk!
OxJam Music Festival
For the whole month of October, Oxjam is about making music, raising money and helping to end poverty!
What a great way to celebrate your graduation, reunite your wave, and spend the evening celebrating local young musical talent!
Saturday 17th of October at The New Generation, 111 Wells Park Road, Sydenham, SE26 6AD
OR
Saturday 31st of October at Addington Community Centre, New Addington, Croydon, CR0 0JB
Click here to get your tickets!
Become an Associate Mentor
Applications close Wednesday 21st of October
Come back and enjoy the NCS programme from another point of view alongside our team team, and help support and guide future participants!
You will also build a huge range of valuable skills from event management, public speaking and mentoring.
Click here to apply!
CV and Interview Workshop
Thursday 29th of October
International events and marketing business UBM are offering NCS graduates the opportunitiy to be involved in a range of CV and Interview workshops.
Find out what managers look for when recruiting new staff, enhance your CV and cover letter and get individual feedback on your interview technique
Click here for more information
Spark your Future at Ignite 2015
Saturday 28th of November
Ignite is our largest event for National Citizen Service grads and aims to help you spark your future, learn new skills, find out about next steps, and reunite with your friends. More information will be released very soon!
Click here to find out more!
Careers Day with Winckworth Sherwood LLP
Tuesday 27th of October
Spend the day in Winckworth Sherwood offices learning about how to pursue a career in law, network with professionals, and be involved in a range of professional workshops!
Click here to reserve your space!
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Rhiannon at tcs.southlondon@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
